Commands.Beast Rush: 3-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Small Attack Up for 2 turns.
Commands.Jecht Slash: 4-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Small Physical Attack Up.
Commands.BRV Attack+: 3-HIT BRV attack.  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.  Requires STR60 Passive Ability.
Commands.Meteor Shot: 4-HIT BRV+HP attack.  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.  Deals 50% HP damage to other targets.  Grants Ultimate Resolve for 6 turns.  If Jecht breaks an enemy within 6 turns after use, nullifies Action Delay and grants a free turn that does not count towards the total turn count (except during Summon Phase/Friend Support).
Commands.HP Attack+: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.

Passives.Beast Rush Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Beast Rush.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Jecht Slash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Jecht Slash.
Passives.BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Beast Rush Charge: Increases the max uses of Beast Rush by 1.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Jecht Slash Charge: Increases the max uses of Jecht Slash by 1.
Passives.Previous Ace Striker: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn when BRV equals 0.
Passives.Buff Base&Speed Up: Tremendously raises Initial BRV and slightly raises Speed while buffed.
Passives.Beast Rush Extend: Tremendously raises the potency of Beast Rush and Beast Rush+.BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 150% of Max BRV.Grants Ultimate Resolve for 1 turn.Ultimate Resolve raises Max BRV and grants BRV regen.
Passives.Jecht Slash Extend: When using Jecht Slash/+:- Moderately raises its potency.- BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 150% of Max BRV.- Grants Ultimate Resolve for 1 turn.- Extends the duration of all buffs granted by 4 turns (excluding Ultimate Resolve).After using Jecht Slash/+:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.- BRV Attack+ is a 3-HIT melee BRV attack with a great potency increase and 120% overflow.

Weapons.Jecht's Sword CP: 15: Increases the potency of Beast Rush and lowers it Action Delay.Increases the potency of Attack Up and extends its duration.Turns Beast Rush to Beast Rush+ when BRV is over 30% of Max BRV, which triggers an HP attack after the BRV hits.
Weapons.Scarsdence CP: 35: Increases Jecht Slash's max uses by 1 and lowers it Action Delay.Grants Medium Max BRV Up for 6 turns.Increases the potency of Physical Attack Up and extends its duration to 6 turns.When BRV is over 30% of Max BRV, increases the potency of Jecht Slash and turns it to Jecht Slash+, which triggers the same attack a second time.
Weapons.Megalith CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Meteor Shot.
